ActNatural Sciences and Engineering Research Council Act
Financial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Designating the Minister of Industry as the Minister for the purposes of the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council Act; and (2) as the appropriate Minister with respect to the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council for the purposes of the Financial Administration Act
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2018-1011 of July 18, 2018; (2) designating the MINISTER OF INDUSTRY, a member of the Queenâ€™s Privy Council for Canada, as the Minister for the purposes of the NATURAL SCIENCES AND ENGINEERING RESEARCH COUNCIL ACT; and (3) designating the MINISTER OF INDUSTRY as the appropriate Minister with respect to the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council for the purposes of the FINANCIAL ADMINISTRATION ACT.
